caption:
The guy used to have trouble writing sentences in a reasonable amount of time. So, we started this thing where he can watch an episode of Avatar: The Last Airbender if he writes a three-sentence entry in his journal in ten minutes.

Now, this is fairly easy for him.

There’s a practice in games in which once a player gets good at a thing, they get reduced rewards for that thing. It feels like a ripoff sometimes, and definitely feels that way in work situations.

However, not changing things doesn’t really work over a large time scale, so some inflation is going to happen.
htmlFragment:
• 4/6/2022, 7:47:28 PM
    The guy used to have trouble writing sentences in a reasonable amount of time. So, we started this thing where he can watch an episode of Avatar: The Last Airbender if he writes a three-sentence entry in his journal in ten minutes.

    Now, this is fairly easy for him.

    There’s a practice in games in which once a player gets good at a thing, they get reduced rewards for that thing. It feels like a ripoff sometimes, and definitely feels that way in work situations.

    However, not changing things doesn’t really work over a large time scale, so some inflation is going to happen.

caption: Kids are maniacs with piñatas. At one point, the piñata was down, and a kid was hitting it with a croquet mallet. On the second swing, it broke open. Kids immediately rushed in. The mallet guy actually started his third swing and stopped it like an inch from another kid's head.
